name: TelePaliza
description:
Barba and Pocolope are going at it for real this time! TelePaliza is a one button multiplayer fighting game. Our entry for the "Transmission" theme for the Global Game Jam 2018.

Controls

Before starting a game, each player will be asked to hold a button or key of their choosing, with which they'll be able to control a character's telekinetic powers.

Original Concept, UI, Backgrounds

Lucas Andrés Velek

Character Artists

Elías Navarro

Jorge Matar

SFX & Music

Jazmín Giolito

Core Programming, VFX & Animation

Mauro Delgaudio
